import React, { useState, useEffect, Component } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import { DatePicker } from "react-rainbow-components"; import '../pages/club-house.css'; function clubHouse() { const state = { startDate: new Date() }; const handleChange = date => { this.setState({ startDate: date }); }; return (

{post.userId} {post.userId} {post.title} {post.body }
) } export default clubHouse;
